content: a simply constructed tank top with the added interest of some stranded footwork that will keep even the most experienced knitter happy try being brave with your colour choices to ensure that a new baby prince or princess is stylish and warm as with all stranded knitting try to keep your floats at the back of the work quite loose particularly over the spot pattern as pulling too tightly will result in puckered fabric this pattern and the milly mobile were released on may 2nd to celebrate the birth of princess charlotte of cambridge
